homeSubTitleDisconnected: Connect your wallet to get started
homeSubTitleConnected: Find a Fractal above or create a new one
helperSigners: The number of trusted users for this Multisig
helperSigThreshold: The number of signatures needed to approve a proposal
subTitleSignerAddresses: The following users are able to submit and approve proposals
helperChooseGovernance: What type of governance would you like?
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) voting is allowed after proposal creation
helperQuorum: The percentage of total possible token votes required to pass a proposal
governanceDescription: These values can be changed later via proposal
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a successful proposal must be executed within
helperTimelockPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a passed proposal must wait to be executed on the blockchain
helperVetoVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent (out of {{totalVotes}}) to veto a proposal on this DAO
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent (out of {{totalVotes}}) to freeze this DAO entirely
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) for a Freeze Votes's starting and ending point
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a successful Freeze Vote will freeze this DAO
vetoGuardDescription: These configuration values may be changed later on by passing a proposal to do so on this child DAO
helperParentAllocation: The total number of tokens claimable by all {{parentName}} token holders
helperTokenName: What is your governance token called?
helperTokenSymbol: The symbol for your token (2-6 chars)
descMultisigGov: Multisignature DAO governance on a Safe contract wallet
descUsulGov: ERC-20 token voting governance on a Safe contract wallet, powered by Usul mod
helperAllocations: Unallocated tokens will be placed in your DAO's treasury
